"Cortes": "I've heard about you. You're still pretty new to Kvaris, ain't you?"
"Relax. I'll help you out. If you're having trouble, just come on over to me!"
"Yo, what's up! Giving it your all, I hope?"
"Ohoh! Those eyes... they're filled with ambition."
"Very well! I shall respond to your resolve by assigning a task to you."
"What say you? Are you interested in broadening your horizons in combat?"
"Ah, you seem to be preoccupied with a mission. When you have adequate time, come and see me again."
"Experience everything. Trying comes at no cost."
"Mm. Perhaps I was mistaken, then. Ah well, we all have those days."
